title: Problem with the snapchat app
content: When i use snapchat app the app freezes alot and  also if i try to open the snapchat app it will take alot of time to open the app and then if i want to switch the screen from snapchat to any another app the phone freezes and snapchat is not working fine in this pixel 3 XL device .I tried reinstalling the app but the issue doesn't  got resolved and then i tried clearing the cache but still i am facing the same problem. What should i do ?
